00078 
00079 /* threadobj->suspend_hook(event) */
00080 #define THREADOBJ_SUSPEND       0x1     /* Just suspended. */
00081 #define THREADOBJ_RESUME        0x2     /* About to resume. */
00082 
00083 /* threadobj->status */
00084 #define THREADOBJ_SCHEDLOCK     0x1     /* Holds the scheduler lock. */
00085 #define THREADOBJ_ROUNDROBIN    0x2     /* Undergoes round-robin. */
00086 #define THREADOBJ_STARTED       0x4     /* threadobj_start() called. */
00087 #define THREADOBJ_WARMUP        0x8     /* threadobj_prologue() not called yet. */
00088 #define THREADOBJ_ABORTED       0x10    /* cancelled before start. */
00089 #define THREADOBJ_LOCKED        0x20    /* threadobj_lock() granted (debug only). */
00090 #define THREADOBJ_DEBUG         0x8000  /* Debug mode enabled. */
00091 
00092 #define THREADOBJ_IRQCONTEXT    ((struct threadobj *)-2UL)
00093 
00094 /* threadobj mode bits */
00095 #define __THREAD_M_LOCK         0x80000000 /* Toggle scheduler lock. */
00096 #define __THREAD_M_WARNSW       0x40000000 /* Toggle switch warning bit. */
00097 #define __THREAD_M_CONFORMING   0x20000000 /* Switch to conforming mode. */
00098 #define __THREAD_M_SPARESTART   0
00099 #define __THREAD_M_SPARECOUNT   12
00100 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE0       0x00000001
00101 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE1       0x00000002
00102 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE2       0x00000004
00103 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE3       0x00000008
00104 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE4       0x00000010
00105 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE5       0x00000020
00106 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE6       0x00000040
00107 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE7       0x00000080
00108 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE8       0x00000100
00109 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE9       0x00000200
00110 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE10      0x00000400
00111 #define __THREAD_M_SPARE11      0x00000800
00112 
00113 struct traceobj;
00114 struct syncobj;
00115 
00116 struct threadobj {
00117         unsigned int magic;     /* Must be first. */
00118         pthread_t tid;
00119         pthread_mutex_t lock;
00120 
00121         void (*finalizer)(struct threadobj *thobj);
00122         void (*suspend_hook)(struct threadobj *thobj, int status);
00123         int *errno_pointer;
00124         int schedlock_depth;
00125         int cancel_state;
00126         int status;
00127         int priority;
00128         pid_t cnode;
00129         const char *name;
00130 
00131         /* Those members belong exclusively to the syncobj code. */
00132         struct syncobj *wait_sobj;
00133         struct holder wait_link;
00134         int wait_status;
00135         int wait_prio;
00136         void (*wait_hook)(struct syncobj *sobj, int status);
00137         void *wait_union;
00138         size_t wait_size;
00139 
00140         struct threadobj_corespec core;
00141         struct timespec tslice;
00142         pthread_cond_t barrier;
00143         struct traceobj *tracer;
00144         struct pvholder thread_link;
00145         struct backtrace_data btd;
00146 };
00147 
00148 struct threadobj_init_data {
00149         unsigned int magic;
00150         cpu_set_t affinity;
00151         int priority;
00152         void (*finalizer)(struct threadobj *thobj);
00153         void (*wait_hook)(struct syncobj *sobj, int status);
00154         void (*suspend_hook)(struct threadobj *thobj, int status);
00155 };

00159 extern int threadobj_irq_prio;

00161 extern pthread_key_t threadobj_tskey;

00163 #ifdef HAVE_TLS
00164 
00165 extern __thread __attribute__ ((tls_model (CONFIG_XENO_TLS_MODEL)))
00166 struct threadobj *__threadobj_current;
00167 
00168 static inline void threadobj_set_current(struct threadobj *thobj)
00169 {
00170         __threadobj_current = thobj;
00171         pthread_setspecific(threadobj_tskey, thobj);
00172 }
00173 
00174 static inline struct threadobj *threadobj_current(void)
00175 {
00176         return __threadobj_current;
00177 }
00178 
00179 #else /* !HAVE_TLS */
00180 
00181 static inline void threadobj_set_current(struct threadobj *thobj)
00182 {
00183         pthread_setspecific(threadobj_tskey, thobj);
00184 }
00185 
00186 static inline struct threadobj *threadobj_current(void)
00187 {
00188         return pthread_getspecific(threadobj_tskey);
00189 }
00190 
00191 #endif /* !HAVE_TLS */

00193 #ifdef __XENO_DEBUG__
00194 
00195 static inline void __threadobj_tag_locked(struct threadobj *thobj)
00196 {
00197         thobj->status |= THREADOBJ_LOCKED;
00198 }
00199 
00200 static inline void __threadobj_tag_unlocked(struct threadobj *thobj)
00201 {
00202         assert(thobj->status & THREADOBJ_LOCKED);
00203         thobj->status &= ~THREADOBJ_LOCKED;
00204 }
00205 
00206 static inline void __threadobj_check_locked(struct threadobj *thobj)
00207 {
00208         assert(thobj->status & THREADOBJ_LOCKED);
00209 }
00210 
00211 #else /* !__XENO_DEBUG__ */
00212 
00213 static inline void __threadobj_tag_locked(struct threadobj *thobj)
00214 {
00215 }
00216 
00217 static inline void __threadobj_tag_unlocked(struct threadobj *thobj)
00218 {
00219 }
00220 
00221 static inline void __threadobj_check_locked(struct threadobj *thobj)
00222 {
00223 }
00224 
00225 #endif /* !__XENO_DEBUG__ */

00288 static inline int threadobj_local_p(struct threadobj *thobj)
00289 {
00290         extern pid_t __node_id;
00291         return thobj->cnode == __node_id;
00292 }

00298         return 1;

00309 #define threadobj_alloc(T, __mptr, W)                                   \
00310         ({                                                              \
00311                 void *__p;                                              \
00312                 __p = __threadobj_alloc(sizeof(T), sizeof(W), offsetof(T, __mptr)); \
00313                 __p;                                                    \
00314         })
00315 
00316 static inline int threadobj_get_priority(struct threadobj *thobj)
00317 {
00318         return thobj->priority;
00319 }
00320 
00321 static inline int threadobj_lock(struct threadobj *thobj)
00322 {
00323         int ret;
00324 
00325         ret = write_lock_safe(&thobj->lock, thobj->cancel_state);
00326         if (ret)
00327                 return ret;
00328 
00329         __threadobj_tag_locked(thobj);
00330 
00331         return 0;
00332 }
00333 
00334 static inline int threadobj_trylock(struct threadobj *thobj)
00335 {
00336         int ret;
00337 
00338         ret = write_trylock_safe(&thobj->lock, thobj->cancel_state);
00339         if (ret)
00340                 return ret;
00341 
00342         __threadobj_tag_locked(thobj);
00343 
00344         return 0;
00345 }
00346 
00347 static inline int threadobj_unlock(struct threadobj *thobj)
00348 {
00349         __threadobj_tag_unlocked(thobj);
00350         return write_unlock_safe(&thobj->lock, thobj->cancel_state);
00351 }
00352 
00353 static inline int threadobj_irq_p(void)
00354 {
00355         struct threadobj *current = threadobj_current();
00356         return current == THREADOBJ_IRQCONTEXT;
00357 }
00358 
00359 static inline int threadobj_current_p(void)
00360 {
00361         struct threadobj *current = threadobj_current();
00362         return current && current != THREADOBJ_IRQCONTEXT;
00363 }
00364 
00365 static inline int threadobj_lock_sched_once(struct threadobj *thobj)
00366 {
00367         if (thobj->schedlock_depth == 0)
00368                 return threadobj_lock_sched(thobj);
00369 
00370         return 0;
00371 }
00372 
00373 static inline void threadobj_yield(void)
00374 {
00375         __RT(sched_yield());
00376 }
00377 
00378 static inline int threadobj_sleep(struct timespec *ts)
00379 {
00380         /*
00381          * XXX: guaranteed to return -EINTR upon threadobj_unblock()
00382          * with both Cobalt and Mercury cores.
00383          */
00384         return -__RT(clock_nanosleep(CLOCK_COPPERPLATE, TIMER_ABSTIME, ts, NULL));
00385 }
00386 
00387 static inline unsigned int threadobj_get_magic(struct threadobj *thobj)
00388 {
00389         return thobj->magic;
00390 }
00391 
00392 static inline void threadobj_set_magic(struct threadobj *thobj,
00393                                        unsigned int magic)
00394 {
00395         thobj->magic = magic;
00396 }
00397 
00398 static inline int threadobj_get_lockdepth(struct threadobj *thobj)
00399 {
00400         return thobj->schedlock_depth;
00401 }
00402 
00403 static inline int threadobj_get_status(struct threadobj *thobj)
00404 {
00405         return thobj->status;
00406 }
00407 
00408 static inline int threadobj_get_errno(struct threadobj *thobj)
00409 {
00410         return *thobj->errno_pointer;
00411 }
00412 
00413 #define threadobj_prepare_wait(T)                                       \
00414         ({                                                              \
00415                 struct threadobj *__thobj = threadobj_current();        \
00416                 assert(__thobj != NULL);                                \
00417                 assert(sizeof(typeof(T)) <= __thobj->wait_size);        \
00418                 __thobj->wait_union;                                    \
00419         })
00420 
00421 #define threadobj_finish_wait()         do { } while (0)
00422 
00423 static inline void *threadobj_get_wait(struct threadobj *thobj)
00424 {
00425         return thobj->wait_union;
00426 }
00427 
00428 static inline const char *threadobj_get_name(struct threadobj *thobj)
00429 {
00430         return thobj->name;
00431 }
00432 
00433 #endif /* _COPPERPLATE_THREADOBJ_H */
